front.title: Interface Identifier Assignment in IPv6 SLAAC

abstract.t: This document proposes an optional mechanism as part of IPv6Stateless Address Autoconfiguration for distribution of uniqueinterface identifiers to IPv6 hosts on a link. Hosts can then usethese unique interface identifiers to generate unique autoconfiguredlink local and global unicast addresses.This mechanism is intended for use in networks where link layeridentifiers are used for generating interface identifiers and wherenon unique link layer identifiers will result in duplicate link localaddresses. An example of such network is Ethernet Broadband accessnetworks.
